dcterms:creator: Chelba, Ciprian
Mikolov, Tomas
Schuster, Mike
Ge, Qi
Brants, Thorsten
Koehn, Philipp
Robinson, Tony
dcterms:description: A large-scale language modeling dataset containing almost one billion tokens with a vocabulary of over 800,000 words. Words appearing less than three times are replaced with a special unknown symbol.
dcterms:title: Google Billion Words

dcterms:creator: Merity, Sam
Xiong, Caiming
Bradbury, James
Socher, Richard
dcterms:description: A dataset containing over 100 million tokens with a vocabulary of about 200,000 words, based on Wikipedia articles. It allows models to condition on entire paragraphs, enabling the evaluation of long-range dependencies.
dcterms:title: WikiText-103
